Class Collisions.CollisionInfo

Enclosing class:
Collisions
public static class Collisions.CollisionInfo
extends java.lang.Object

CollisionInfo - Holds all information related to a collision that needs to be processed by the engine - all information regarding collision should be accessed in a static way, with no worry as to manipulation of data

Author:
Ragu Vijaykumar
